subject: Your monthly invoice is here
body:
Dear Customer,

Your invoice for the month of July is attached. The total amount due is $42.50.

Thank you for your business.

subject: Urgent: Project Deadline
body: Hi team, quick reminder that the deadline for the Phoenix project is this Friday. Please submit all your deliverables by then. Let me know if you have any blockers.

body: You've been selected for our biggest sale of the year! Get 50% off all items. Click here to shop now! Limited time offer.

subject: Question about your services
body: Hello, I found your company online and I'm interested in your AI consulting services. Could you provide more information on your pricing and typical engagement model? Thanks, Jane Doe.

subject: Company-wide Update: New Holiday Policy
body: All, please be advised of the new company holiday policy, effective immediately. The updated handbook is available on the company intranet. No action is required from your side.
